document_data.name: Revjak
document_data.mainbody: '''Revjak''' was a [[barbarian]] king of the [[Tribe of the Elk]] in [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Personality: Revjak was always in control of his emotions. He had a secret desire to experience "civilized life" in the cities of the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.History:
After the death of [[Heafstaag]] at the hands of [[Wulfgar]] in the {{YearlinkName|1356}}, Revjak became king of the tribe and was the one to unify the nomadic [[Reghedman]] tribes and strengthen their relationships with the people of the [[Ten Towns]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1364}}, [[Berkthgar]] challenged Revjak for the kingship of the Tribe of the Elk and won, thus ending an era of cooperation between the barbarians and the Ten Towns.
document_data.Relationships:
Revjak was the son of [[Jorn|Jorn the Red]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1347}}, Revjak's son [[Kierstaad]] was born. Like his father, he embraced "civilized ways." He later became king of the Tribe of the Elk until his death.

He was friends with [[Wulfgar]]'s father, [[Beornegar]].
